## Research Question & Objectives  

.pull-left[
**Key Question:**  
How do fishing decisions, catch levels, and prices respond to climatic scenarios in Chile's small pelagic fishery (SPF)?  
]

.pull-right[
**Objectives:**  
1. Estimate multi-species harvest model  
2. Assess climate impacts on adaptation strategies  
3. Inform resilience policies  
]
